Headline: #70 Division Temporary Reroute at Division/Kolmar
ShortDescription: 70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted via Division, Cicero, Augusta, Kostner, and  Division due to, street blockage near Division/Kolmar.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted via Division, Cicero, Augusta, Kostner, and  Division due to, street blockage near Division/Kolmar.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Southbound #9 Ashland & #X9 Ashland Express Temporary Reroute near Ashland/15th
ShortDescription: SB 9 Ashland & X9 Ashland Express buses are temp rerouted via Ashland, Roosevelt, Racine, Blue Island, 18th, Ashland due to street blockage near Ashland/15th

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #9 Ashland & #X9 Ashland Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, Roosevelt, Racine, Blue Island, 18th, and Ashland due to, street blockage near Ashland/15th.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
